description: Marketplace Tech has been talking about the International Consumer Electronics Show all week. And on the last day of CES, we're starting to get a sense of this year's offerings. One takeaway is that there is no one takeaway. We saw updates of smart devices and the ways they might talk to one another. And wearable technology is seeing a bunch of growth. But even if the future of 2014 is bright, it's not really in focus yet. Plus, the production designer of "Her" discusses designing the ways we interact with technology in the future.
